title: Introduction
content: Introduction rbx-faker is a library that mocks Roblox data such as group icons and display names, inspired by faker-js. View API →

title: getLoremIpsum​
content: </> Text.getLoremIpsum( sentenceCount?: number-- The amount of sentences in the Lorem ipsum ) → string Gets a segment of Lorem ipsum.

title: getGroupInfo​
content: </> Groups.getGroupInfo() → GroupInfo
interface GroupInfo { id: number name: string description: string icon: string }  Gets some group info from the groups list.

title: createList​
content: </> Utils.createList( fn: () → TReturn, count: number ) → {TReturn} Creates an array of length count filled with the return value of fn. (fn is called each iteration)

title: createUniqueList​
content: </> Utils.createUniqueList( fn: () → TReturn, count: number ) → {TReturn} Creates an array of length count filled with the return value of fn. (fn is called each iteration, and the table cannot contain duplicate values)
